description:
The size and bulk of a fixed blade means it's not always practical – that’s where a folder comes in. With beautiful red birch handle scales that are sculpted to nest perfectly in your hand, the medium Raud is a quality tool designed for decades of use. The 12C27 blade is a solid performer and is a bit more corrosion resistant than laminate steel. Featuring a traditional Scandi grind, the edge excels at bushcraft and other outdoor tasks.

  • 12C27 stainless steel is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well
  • Scandinavian (Scandi) grind excels at everyday tasks
  • Handle scales are carved out of red birch wood
  • Sculpted guard keeps fingers safe from the edge
  • Lined lanyard tube for your personalized lanyard
  • Time-tested lock-back design is easy to operate and keeps the blade in place when in use
  • Simple and reliable nail-nick blade access
  • Includes detachable clip for secure carry
  • Helle knives have been made in a small Norwegian village since 1932. Created by craftsman who take pride in their work. Each knife has passed through experienced hands on its way to your pocket
  • Natural materials, give each knife its own personality with variations in colour and patterns
name: Helle Raud M Knife
